attributes.action: Consider Enforcing Insurance companies OR create a "Contribution LOSS fund"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Consider Enforcing Insurance companies OR create a "Contribution LOSS fund" by taking % of Insurance companies Profits. 
 This "Contribution LOSS fund" would ensure the "individuals pension CONTRIBUTION" is never higher than the actual pension fund. 
This will REQUIRE the insurance company "fund Managers" to place pension funds in businesses that are less likely to suffer at the hands of speculators. 

IF this is not deemed practical - then the government will be required to bail out the insurance companies and make good the loses for the pensioner in the same way the have for the banks and industry.
